item.title: ncore -- CSAW Quals 2021
item.description: Points: 484 (dynamic) Solves: 53 Description: We have a very safe core with a very safe enclave Problem: Server We are given a server.py file that is running on the server that reads user input and stores it in a ram.hex file. The server then uses vvp (Icarus Verilog vvp runtime engine) to run a compiled SystemVerilog file called nco. For debugging, you can install the iverilog compiler, which compiles SystemVerilog source files to vvp assembly, which can then be executed by vvp.
